title: Remove 'Brotherhood of Copper' banner from Home Page hero

requirements.text: Remove the 'Brotherhood of Copper' banner image from the Home Page hero section by deleting the banner block that references `/assets/generated/brotherhood of copper banner.png` in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`, ensuring the hero layout still has balanced spacing above the icon/title on mobile and desktop.

quotes: remove the brotherhood of copper banner

acceptanceCriteria: Home Page no longer renders an whose src is `/assets/generated/brotherhood of copper banner.png`.
The hero section content (icon, title, description, CTAs) remains centered and visually well-spaced on both mobile and desktop after removal.
No other pages/components are modified as part of this change.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only).
Do not modify any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Deleting the static image file from `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (only removing it from the UI).
Changing any other 'Brotherhood of Copper' branding text, navigation, or page content.
